DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate feasibility combine Cognitive Remediation Therapy ( CRT ) Family Based Treatment ( FBT ) future use randomize clinical trial reduce risk adolescent develop persistent Anorexia Nervosa . Participants randomly assign one two group : one group receive FBT CRT , group receive FBT art therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Combining Family Cognitive Therapy Prevent Chronic Anorexia
DOC.criteria: Meets DSMIV criterion anorexia nervosa Lives least one Englishspeaking parent willing participate Medically Stable Endorses obsessions/compulsions Adequate transportation clinic Proficient speaking , reading , write English Previous FBT CRT AN Medical Instability Medical condition may affect eat weight
